curam.util.client.model

Interface StylesContext

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Context
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    RendererContext

    public interface StylesContext
extends Context
    A context that provides access to style information. This information can be used when modeling components for a page and directing how they should be rendered.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Style getStyle(java.lang.String name)
      Gets the style with the given name.

    • Method Detail

      • getStyle

        Style getStyle(java.lang.String name)
        throws PlugInException
        Gets the style with the given name. An exception will be thrown if the named style is not defined in the styles plug-in configuration, as a request for an undefined style is likely to be a coding or configuration defect.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the style.
        Returns:
        The named style.
        Throws:
        PlugInException - If the named style is not defined.
